Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the Acquisition Mode of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the Acquisition Mode of the device.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStart
Command.ToolTip: Starts the Acquisition of the device.
Command.Description: Starts the Acquisition of the device.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStop
Command.ToolTip: Stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current Frame.
Command.Description: Stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current Frame.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the type of trigger to configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the type of trigger to configure.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the selected trigger is active.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the selected trigger is active.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature defines the source of the trigger signal.
Enumeration.Description: This feature defines the source of the trigger signal.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerActivation
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature defines the activation mode of the trigger signal.
Enumeration.Description: This feature defines the activation mode of the trigger signal.

Integer.Name: TriggerCount
Integer.ToolTip: Returns number of trigger signals detected.
Integer.Description: Returns number of trigger signals detected. To reset write '0'.

Integer.Name: TriggerDebouncer
Integer.ToolTip: Set trigger ebouncer time in [usec].
Integer.Description: Set trigger debouncer time in [usec]..

Command.Name: TriggerSoftware
Command.ToolTip: Generates an internal trigger. TriggerSource must be set to Software.
Command.Description: Generates an internal trigger. TriggerSource must be set to Software.

Enumeration.Name: TestImageSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the type of test image that is sent by the camera.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the type of test image that is sent by the camera.

Enumeration.Name: ExposureMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the operation mode of the shutter.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the operation mode of the shutter.

Integer.Name: ExposureTime
Integer.ToolTip: Defines the exposure time of the image in [us]
Integer.Description: Defines the exposure time of the image in [us]

Integer.Name: AcquisitionFrameRate
Integer.ToolTip: Defines the acquisition frame rate in [Hz]
Integer.Description: Defines the acquisition frame rate in [Hz]

Integer.Name: AcquisitionFrameRateMax
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the max. acquisition frame rate in [Hz]
Integer.Description: Returns the max. acquisition frame rate in [Hz]

Enumeration.Name: UserSetSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the feature User Set to load, save or configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the feature User Set to load, save or configure.

Command.Name: UserSetLoad
Command.ToolTip: Loads the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the device and makes it active.
Command.Description: Loads the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the device and makes it active.

Command.Name: UserSetSave
Command.ToolTip: Save the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the non-volatile memory of the device.
Command.Description: Save the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the non-volatile memory of the device.

Enumeration.Name: UserSetDefaultSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the feature User Set to load and make active when the device is reset.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the feature User Set to load and make active when the device is reset.

Enumeration.Name: FileSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the target file in the device.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the target file in the device.

Enumeration.Name: FileOperationSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the target operation for the selected file.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the target operation for the selected file.

Command.Name: FileOperationExecute
Command.ToolTip: Executes the operation selected by FileOperationSelector on the selected file.
Command.Description: Executes the operation selected by FileOperationSelector on the selected file.

Enumeration.Name: FileOpenMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the access mode in which a file is opened.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the access mode in which a file is opened.

Integer.Name: FileAccessBuffer
Integer.ToolTip: File access Read/Write buffer.
Integer.Description: File access Read/Write buffer.

Integer.Name: FileAccessOffset
Integer.ToolTip: Offset in file to read from.
Integer.Description: Offset in file to read from.

Integer.Name: FileAccessLength
Integer.ToolTip: Number of Bytes to read from file.
Integer.Description: Number of Bytes to read from file.

Enumeration.Name: FileOperationStatus
Enumeration.ToolTip: Represents the file operation execution status.
Enumeration.Description: Represents the file operation execution status.

Integer.Name: FileOperationResult
Integer.ToolTip: Number of successfully read/written bytes.
Integer.Description: Number of successfully read/written bytes.

Integer.Name: FileSize
Integer.ToolTip: Size of the selected file in bytes.
Integer.Description: Size of the selected file in bytes.

Integer.Name: WidthAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Manufacturer-specific address of feature Width.
Integer.Description: Manufacturer-specific address of feature Width.

Integer.Name: HeightAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Manufacturer-specific address of feature Height.
Integer.Description: Manufacturer-specific address of feature Heigt.

Integer.Name: AcquisitionModeAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Manufacturer-specific address of feature AcquisitionMode.
Integer.Description: Manufacturer-specific address of feature AcquisitionMode.

Integer.Name: AcquistionStartAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Manufacturer-specific address of feature AcquistionStart.
Integer.Description: Manufacturer-specific address of feature AcquistionStart.

Integer.Name: AcquistionStopAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Manufacturer-specific address of feature AcquistionStop.
Integer.Description: Manufacturer-specific address of feature AcquistionStop.

Integer.Name: PixelFormatAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Manufacturer-specific address of feature PixelFormat.
Integer.Description: Manufacturer-specific address of feature PixelFormat.

Integer.Name: DeviceTapGeometryAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Manufacturer-specific address of feature DeviceTapGeometry.
Integer.Description: Manufacturer-specific address of feature DeviceTapGeometry.

Integer.Name: Image1StreamIDAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Manufacturer-specific address of feature Image1StreamID.
Integer.Description: Manufacturer-specific address of feature Image1StreamID.

Integer.Name: ControlPacketSizeMax
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the maximum control packet data size, in multiples of 4 bytes.
Integer.Description: Provides the maximum control packet data size, in multiples of 4 bytes.

Integer.Name: DeviceConnectionID
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the ID of the Device connection via which this register is read.
Integer.Description: Provides the ID of the Device connection via which this register is read.

Integer.Name: Iidc2Address
Integer.ToolTip: If not 0, this is the start address of the IIDC2 register space.
Integer.Description: If not 0, this is the start address of the IIDC2 register space.

Enumeration.Name: ConnectionConfig
Enumeration.ToolTip: Holds a valid combination of Device connection speed and number of active connections.
Enumeration.Description: Holds a valid combination of Device connection speed and number of active connections.

Integer.Name: ConnectionConfigDefault
Integer.ToolTip: Holds a valid default mode combination of Device connection speed and number of active connections.
Integer.Description: Holds a valid default mode combination of Device connection speed and number of active connections.

Command.Name: ConnectionReset
Command.ToolTip: Resets all connections of the Device.
Command.Description: Resets all connections of the Device.

Integer.Name: MasterHostConnectionID
Integer.ToolTip: Holds the Host Connection ID of the Host connection connected to the Device Master connection.
Integer.Description: Holds the Host Connection ID of the Host connection connected to the Device Master connection.

Integer.Name: Revision
Integer.ToolTip: Version of the CoaXPress specifciation implemented.
Integer.Description: Version of the CoaXPress specifciation implemented.

Integer.Name: Standard
Integer.ToolTip: Unique Identification of the CoaXPress Standard.
Integer.Description: Unique Identification of the CoaXPress Standard.

Integer.Name: StreamPacketSizeMax
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the maximum stream packet data size the Host can accept, in multiples of 4 bytes.
Integer.Description: Provides the maximum stream packet data size the Host can accept, in multiples of 4 bytes.

Enumeration.Name: TestErrorCountSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the TestErrorCount register. Selection shall be a valid Device Connection ID.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the TestErrorCount register. Selection shall be a valid Device Connection ID.

Integer.Name: TestErrorCount
Integer.ToolTip: Current connection error count selected by TestErrorCountSelector.
Integer.Description: Current connection error count selected by TestErrorCountSelector. Writing 0x0 resets the register.

Integer.Name: TestPacketCountTx
Integer.ToolTip: Reads the 64 Bit Test Packet transmit counter selected by TestErrorCountSelector.
Integer.Description: Reads the 64 Bit Test Packet transmit counter selected by TestErrorCountSelector. Writing 0x0 resets the register.

Integer.Name: TestPacketCountRx
Integer.ToolTip: Returns one of the 64 Bit Test Packet receive counter.
Integer.Description: Returns one of the 64 Bit Test Packet receive counter. Writing 0x0 resets the register.

Integer.Name: CapabilityRegister
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates which optional features are supported.
Integer.Description: Indicates which optional features are supported.

Integer.Name: FeatureControlRegister
Integer.ToolTip: Enable/disabel optional device featrues.
Integer.Description: >Enable/disabel optional device featrues.

Integer.Name: VersionsSupported
Integer.ToolTip: Version of the CoaXPress specifciation supported.
Integer.Description: Version of the CoaXPress specifciation supported.

Enumeration.Name: VersionUsed
Enumeration.ToolTip: Version of the CoaXPress specifciation used for communication between Device and Host.
Enumeration.Description: Version of the CoaXPress specifciation used for communication between Device and Host.

Enumeration.Name: TestMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Enables test packet transmission from Device to Host.
Enumeration.Description: Enables test packet transmission from Device to Host.

Integer.Name: XmlManifestSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selects the XML manifest entry.
Integer.Description: Selects the XML manifest entry.

Integer.Name: XmlManifestSize
Integer.ToolTip: The number of XML manifests available.
Integer.Description: The number of XML manifests available.

Integer.Name: XmlSchemeVersion
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the scheme version of the XML file referenced by the XmlManifestSelector.
Integer.Description: Indicates the scheme version of the XML file referenced by the XmlManifestSelector.

Integer.Name: XmlUrlAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the start of the URL string referenced by the XmlManifestSelector.
Integer.Description: Indicates the start of the URL string referenced by the XmlManifestSelector.

Integer.Name: XmlVersion
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the version of the XML file referenced by the XmlManifestSelector.
Integer.Description: Indicates the version of the XML file referenced by the XmlManifestSelector.

String.Name: DeviceVendorName
String.ToolTip: Name of the manufacturer of the device.
String.Description: Name of the manufacturer of the device.

Enumeration.Name: CxpLinkConfigurationStatus
Enumeration.ToolTip: Current and active Link configuration by the Device.
Enumeration.Description: This feature indicates the current and active Link configuration used by the Device.

Enumeration.Name: CxpLinkConfigurationPreferred
Enumeration.ToolTip: Provides the default Link configuration of the Device.
Enumeration.Description: Provides the default Link configuration of the Device.

Enumeration.Name: CxpLinkConfiguration
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specify the Link configuration of the Device
Enumeration.Description: Specify the Link configuration of the Device.

Integer.Name: CxpConnectionSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selects the CoaXPress physical connection to control.
Integer.Description: Selects the CoaXPress physical connection to control.

Enumeration.Name: CxpConnectionTestMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Enables the test mode.
Enumeration.Description: Enables the test mode.

Integer.Name: CxpConnectionTestErrorCount
Integer.ToolTip: Current connection error count selected by CxpConnectionSelector.
Integer.Description: Current connection error count selected by CxpConnectionSelector. Writing 0x0 resets the register.

Integer.Name: CxpConnectionTestPacketCount
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the 64 Bit Test Packet receive counter, selected by CxpConnectionSelector.
Integer.Description: Returns the 64 Bit Test Packet receive counter, selected by CxpConnectionSelector. Writing 0x0 resets the register.

Command.Name: DeviceReset
Command.ToolTip: Resets the camera to its power up state.
Command.Description: Resets the camera to its power up state.

Integer.Name: Height
Integer.ToolTip: Height of the image provided by the device (pixels)
Integer.Description: Height of the image provided by the device (pixels)

Integer.Name: OffsetX
Integer.ToolTip: Horizontal offset from the origin to the area of interest (in pixels)
Integer.Description: Horizontal offset from the origin to the area of interest (in pixels)

Integer.Name: HeightMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum height (in pixels) of the image.
Integer.Description: Maximum height (in pixels) of the image.

Integer.Name: Image1StreamID
Integer.ToolTip: Identification of stream 1.
Integer.Description: Identification of stream 1.

Enumeration.Name: PixelFormat
Enumeration.ToolTip: Format of the pixel to use for acquisition.
Enumeration.Description: Format of the pixel to use for acquisition.

Enumeration.Name: TapGeometry
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature describes the format image data is transfered from the camera to the host.
Enumeration.Description: This feature describes the format image data is transfered from the camera to the host.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceScanType
Enumeration.ToolTip: Scan type of the sensor.
Enumeration.Description: Scan type of the sensor.

Integer.Name: SensorHeight
Integer.ToolTip: Effective height of the sensor in pixels.
Integer.Description: Effective height of the sensor in pixels.

Integer.Name: SensorWidth
Integer.ToolTip: Effective width of the sensor in pixels.
Integer.Description: Effective width of the sensor in pixels.

Enumeration.Name: RegionDestination
Enumeration.ToolTip: Control the destination of the selected region.
Enumeration.Description: Control the destination of the selected region.

Integer.Name: Width
Integer.ToolTip: Width of the Image provided by the device (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Width of the Image provided by the device (in pixels).

Integer.Name: OffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: Vertical offset from the origin to the area of interest (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Vertical offset from the origin to the area of interest (in pixels).

Integer.Name: WidthMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum width (in pixels) of the image.
Integer.Description: Maximum width (in pixels) of the image.

Enumeration.Name: AnalogGain
Enumeration.ToolTip: Defines the analog Gain in discrete steps.
Enumeration.Description: Defines the analog Gain in discrete steps.

Integer.Name: BlackLevel
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the analog black level.
Integer.Description: Controls the analog black level.

Enumeration.Name: LineSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects a physical line to configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects a physical line to configure.

Enumeration.Name: LineSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which internal signal to output on the selected Line.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which internal signal to output on the selected Line.

Boolean.Name: LineInverter
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls the inversion of the signal of the selected Line.
Boolean.Description: Controls the inversion of the signal of the selected Line.

Enumeration.Name: UserOutputSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which bit of the User Output register will be set by UserOutputValue.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which bit of the User Output register will be set by UserOutputValue.

Boolean.Name: UserOutputValue
Boolean.ToolTip: Sets the value of the bit selected by UserOutputSelector.
Boolean.Description: Sets the value of the bit selected by UserOutputSelector.

Float.Name: Gamma
Float.ToolTip: Controls the gamma correction of pixel intensity.
Float.Description: Controls the gamma correction of pixel intensity.

Float.Name: DigitalGain
Float.ToolTip: Controls the digital gain of the camera.
Float.Description: Controls the digital gain of the camera.

Command.Name: TxLogicalConnectionReset
Command.ToolTip: Reset next packet transmition to connection 0.
Command.Description: Reset next packet transmition to connection 0.

Integer.Name: DeviceInformation
Integer.ToolTip: This feature returns an element of the device information list selected by feature DeviceInformationSelector.
Integer.Description: This feature returns an element of the device information list selected by feature DeviceInformationSelector.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceInformationSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature defines the selector value for accessing an element from the device information list.
Enumeration.Description: This feature defines the selector value for accessing an element from the device information list.

Enumeration.Name: AnalogRegisterSetSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature selects one of the analog registers sets for read/write access.
Enumeration.Description: This feature selects one of the analog registers sets for read/write access.

Integer.Name: AnalogRegisterSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selects one of the analog registers for access.
Integer.Description: Selects one of the analog registers for access.

Integer.Name: AnalogValue
Integer.ToolTip: Analog value [mV] to read/write.
Integer.Description: Analog value [mV] to read/write.

Boolean.Name: InfoFieldFrameCounterEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables/disables the Frame Counter info field in the image.
Boolean.Description: Enables/disables the Frame Counter info field in the image.

Boolean.Name: InfoFieldTimeStampEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables/disables the Time Stamp field in the image.
Boolean.Description: Enables/disables the Time Stamp field in the image.

Boolean.Name: InfoFieldRoiEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables/disables the ROI info field in the image.
Boolean.Description: Enables/disables the ROI info field in the image.

Enumeration.Name: FixedPatternNoiseReduction
Enumeration.ToolTip: Switches the Fixed Pattern Noise Reduction feature on or off.
Enumeration.Description: Switches the Fixed Pattern Noise Reduction feature on or off.

Integer.Name: RegisterNumber
Integer.ToolTip: Register number.
Integer.Description: Number of the register to R/W.

Integer.Name: RegisterValue
Integer.ToolTip: Register value
Integer.Description: Value of the selected register

Port.Name: Device
Port.ToolTip: Port giving access to the device.
